pages.description: California Green Building Standards Code residential mandatory measures checklist, Sheet 1 of 2. Covers planning/design, site development, water efficiency/conservation, and energy efficiency sections.
key_content: Chapter 3 Green Building Section 301 General
Section 4.106 Site Development - grading, paving, EV charging, stormwater
Division 4.2 Energy Efficiency standards
Division 4.3 Water Efficiency and Conservation - indoor water use, fixture flow rates
Water closets 1.28 gal/flush, showerheads 1.8 GPM, kitchen faucets 1.8 GPM
Section 4.304 outdoor water use / landscape

pages.description: California Green Building Standards Code residential mandatory measures checklist, Sheet 2 of 2. Covers pollutant control, environmental quality (VOC limits, formaldehyde, carpet, flooring), material conservation, and installer qualifications.

Table 4.504.1 adhesive VOC limits by type
Table 4.504.2 sealant VOC limits
Formaldehyde emission limits (Table 4.504.5)

Division 4.4 Material Conservation and Resource Efficiency
Section 702 Qualifications - installer trainer, special inspector

pages.description: Side-by-side existing (E) and new (N) site plans at 1/8" = 1'-0" scale. Shows property lines, setbacks, existing single-family residence (1,854 sq ft), existing two-car garage (394 sq ft), new 600 sq ft ADU placement, covered landing/patio, trellis demolition area, and utility locations.
key_content: Property: 89' wide lot, 7'-1" SFR setback, 33'-8" SFR setback on side
Existing: 1,854 sq ft one-story SFR, 394 sq ft two-car garage, 200 amp electrical
(E) 50 gal tank water heater to be removed
New ADU: 600 sq ft, 30'-6" x 19'-8" approx, at rear of property
ADU setback: 54'-6" from front, 4' side setback
Demo: 2 trellises (378 sq ft total)
New covered landing/patio (98 sq ft)
New electric heat pump water heater within framed stucco enclosure
New ductless heat pump mini-split condenser location
100 amp electrical sub panel for ADU

drawing_zones.content: (E) Existing Site Plan - showing current conditions
(N) New Site Plan - showing proposed ADU and improvements
Site Plan Legend and Site Plan Notes

pages.sheet_title: (E) Single-Fam. Residence Roof Plan w/ Demo

Existing SFR (1,854 sq ft) roof outline shown
Demolition notes covering material handling, salvage, protection

pages.sheet_title: (N) ADU Floor Plan w/ Schedules & Electrical
pages.description: New ADU floor plan at 1/4" = 1'-0" scale with electrical layout overlay. Includes window schedule (6 windows), door schedule (6 doors), electrical symbols legend, kitchen electrical notes (21 items), smoke/CO alarm requirements, egress standards, plumbing fixture notes, and 1-hr fire rated exterior wall detail.
key_content: Floor plan: kitchen, living, bedroom, bath, closet, pocket storage
30'-6" x ~19'-8" ADU footprint
Kitchen with island and under-cabinet storage
100 amp electrical sub-panel location
Window schedule: 6 windows (A through F), sizes 30x36 to 60x48
Door schedule: 6 doors including front, side french, bath, bedroom, closet
Electrical: recessed lights, switches, outlets, GFCI, exhaust fan, smoke/CO detectors
Typical kitchen electrical notes (21 items)
Smoke & CO alarm requirements (8 items)
Minimum bedroom egress standards
Plumbing fixture water use table
1-hr fire rated exterior wall section detail (7/8" cement plaster, R-15 insulation, 16" OC studs)

drawing_zones.content: Window Schedule and Door Schedule tables
Electrical Symbols Legend

(N) Floor Plan w/ Electrical overlay

pages.sheet_title: Elevations, Sections, Roof Plan for ADU
pages.description: All four building elevations (W/S/N/E) at 1/4" = 1'-0", roof plan at 1/4" = 1'-0", and two building section cuts (A and B) at 1/4" = 1'-0". Shows exterior finishes, roof material, attic ventilation calculations, capillary break detail, and drip edge/eave assembly.
key_content: West Elevation: stucco finish to match existing home, heat pump/water heater enclosure, patio cover, 16'-2" to top
South Elevation: 19'-8" wide, dormer vent, roof pitch shown
North Elevation: cable vent, ductless heat pump condenser, 30'-6" width
East Elevation: heat pump enclosure, stucco finish
Roof Plan: Class A asphalt shingles (ESR-1475), R-30 insulation, 2x rafters per structural
Attic ventilation calc: 600 sq ft area, need 540 SI net free (dormer vents 12x24) + 162 SI (cable vents 14x18) = 702 total
Section A: Shows R-30 attic insulation, R-15 wall insulation, room heights
Section B: Shows bedroom, bath, closet, kitchen cross-section
Capillary break detail at slab/foundation
1-hr fire rated under-eave assembly and drip edge detail
Roofing: Class A asphalt shingles, 2 layers Grade D paper, dark grey/slate to match existing

drawing_zones.content: West Elevation
South Elevation
Roof Plan with legend and ventilation calcs

pages.description: Structural notes sheet 1 covering statement of special inspection, inspection schedule, design criteria (loads, seismic), concrete specifications, reinforcement requirements, and foundation notes.
key_content: Dead loads: Roof 18 PSF
Live loads: Roof 20 PSF (reducible)
Seismic: Importance factor 1.3, Ss=1.756, S1=0.618, SDS=1.405, Site Class D
Plywood shearwalls R=6.5, wind 95 MPH, Exposure B
Concrete: 2500 PSI, Type V cement, W/C 0.45 max
Rebar: ASTM A-615 Grade 60
Foundation: min 18" below grade, 12" into native soil, 1000 PSF bearing
Special inspection required for: concrete, reinforcing steel, structural wood, soil, post-installed anchors
9 foundation notes covering bolts, sill plates, connections

drawing_zones.content: Statement of Special Inspection, Inspection Schedule, Design Criteria
Concrete specifications and Reinforcement requirements
General structural notes (9 items) and Foundation notes (9 items)

pages.description: Structural notes sheet 2 with comprehensive nailing schedule, mechanical and adhesive anchor specifications, and structural wood requirements. Includes toe nail installation detail.
key_content: Full nailing schedule (~30 connection types with nail sizes and spacing)
Mechanical anchors: SET-3G Simpson Strong-Tie, Hilti adhesive anchors
Adhesive anchors: ASTM A36 threaded rods, A563 grade nuts
Anchor testing: proof-test 20% of all anchors, test within 24 hours
Structural wood: Douglas Fir-Larch, WCLIB/WWPA graded
Parallam PSL 2.2E (2900 Fb) for glulam
LSL: TimberStrand by Weyerhaeuser Grade 1.55E
I-joists: TJI by Weyerhaeuser
Narrow steel shear panels: Hardy Frames HFX (LARR#25759), Simpson Strong Walls (DSW)
16 structural wood notes covering lumber grades, sill plates, sheathing, moisture, SCL members

drawing_zones.content: Nailing Schedule (1) table and Toe Nail Installation detail
Mechanical and Adhesive Anchors specifications (15 items)
Structural Wood specifications (16 items)

Holdown locations marked (4x4 HDU2 at multiple locations)
Shearwall marks (S2 and S3 references)
Concrete landing per architectural
Partial Floor Framing Plan: 2x6 R.R. @ 16" O.C., 4x6 headers, 4x8 ridge board, 2x10 C.J.
7 foundation notes (bolts, sill plates, Type V cement, connections to existing)
4 framing notes (shearwall sheathing, floor sheathing specs, header sizes, stud wall framing)

pages.description: Certificate of Compliance - Residential Performance Compliance Method (CF1R-PRF-01-E). Contains pages 1-3 of 10 of the energy compliance report. Covers project info, energy use summary, envelope components, and compliance margins.
key_content: CF1R generated 2025-06-30, software CEC Res 2022 Rev 2.9
Calculation: T11E 24 COMPLIANCE
Standard Design EDR: 10.4 / Proposed Design EDR: 19.8 (compliant)
Conditioned floor area: 570 sq ft (net)
HVAC: Heat pump ducting system, 2 zones
Envelope: 4 window groups (front/rear exterior walls)
Door: 1 front exterior door
Energy Use Summary: Space heating, cooling, ventilation, water heating margins all positive
Total compliance margin: 75.09
PV system: 0.13 kWdc required

drawing_zones.content: CF1R pages 1-2: Project info, energy summary table, envelope components
CF1R page 3: Detailed energy use summary with margins by category

pages.description: Certificate of Compliance pages 4-8 of 10. Covers HVAC heat pump verification, fan systems, indoor air quality, fenestration/glazing details, building envelope HERS verification, water heating systems, and HVAC conditioning system details.
key_content: HVAC heat pump: verified airflow, refrigerant, heating/cooling
Fenestration: 4 window types with U-factor, SHGC values
Window CC1: Front exterior NFRC 0.30 U / 0.23 SHGC
Window CC2: Front exterior NFRC 0.30 U / 0.23 SHGC
Door 1: Front exterior, R-value 0.2
Building envelope: R-21 wall (wood framed), R-19 attic (wood framed), R-38 ceiling
HERS verification: PV+B water spray foam insulation, building envelope air leakage
Water heating: DHW System = Domestic Hot Water, Heat Pump Water Heater, standard distribution
HVAC: Heat pump ducting system, 2 heat pump units

drawing_zones.content: CF1R pages 4-5: HVAC verification, fan systems, IAQ, fenestration
CF1R pages 6-8: Envelope, HERS, water heating, HVAC details

pages.description: Comprehensive mandatory requirements summary for single-family residential per 2022 California Energy Code. Multi-page reference checklist covering building envelope, HVAC, water heating, lighting, solar, and electrical requirements with code section references.
key_content: Building envelope: air leakage, fenestration, insulation requirements
HVAC: duct sealing, refrigerant charge, equipment sizing
Water heating: pipe insulation, solar water heating, heat pump requirements
Lighting: indoor/outdoor requirements, controls, dimmers
Solar readiness / minimum solar zone
Electrical: main service panel, EV charging readiness
Appliance requirements and energy storage readiness
Each item has code section reference (e.g., ยง150.0(a), ยง150.1(b))
